long_description: Cycling reference map is loaded with information including trail facts, general trail descriptions and three indexs to help you find the right ride. Map offers a trail to map index, a city to trail index and a county to trail index. Trail facts include length of trail, surface, biking type, location and trail coodinates (latitudes/longitude). Includes insets of St. Louis, Kansas City and Columbia areas. Full-color, 2-sided map measures 26" x 38". Published by American Bike Trails.
short_description: Cycling reference map is loaded with information including trail facts, general trail descriptions and three indexs to help you find the right ride.
